reviews.review: Still the best game game in the world.

Too bad this game died out.
This game is timeless. One of the best FPS in my opinion!
Played various incarnations of CS since the 90s.  Simple yet still requires some skills.  Easy to pick up yet takes some time to master.
This game steals all my time
